content: If you’re having trouble dealing with his many lightning attacks, remember to use Immobilize whenever you see him charge up to interrupt the attack entirely, limiting how much he can actually try to electrify you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
If you’re having trouble dealing with his many lightning attacks, remember to use Immobilize whenever you see him charge up to interrupt the attack entirely, limiting how much he can actually try to electrify you.
